actionConfiguration.body:
CTE_view_channel as (
select sum(cast(total_video_views as decimal)) as channel_view
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
where WHERE view_date > '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
  AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
	AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
group by channel_display_name
),
CTE_lastMonth as (
select channel_display_name AS channel,
SUM(views) as MTD_last_Month
FROM public.smg_dmp_youtube_dashboard_unq_view
where date > '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
  AND date < '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-31")}}':: date
group by channel
),
with CTE_lastYear as (
select channel_display_name AS channel,
SUM(views) as MTD_last_year
FROM public.smg_dmp_youtube_dashboard_unq_view
where date > '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-01-01")}}':: date
  AND date < '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}':: date
group by channel
)
select * from CTE_MTD,CTE_lastMonth,CTE_lastYear 
where CTE_lastYear.channel= CTE_lastMonth.channel and
CTE_lastYear.channel= CTE_MTD.channel
order by MTD DESC;
